name: Puzzle Cube (itch) (CrazyEnigmaStudio)
description:
Puzzle cube is somewhat of a puzzle game dashing from wall to wall trying to reach the end. have fun

this game will be updated once or twice per week (mainly bug fixes game mechanics and lots and lots of levels)

coming to google play store (for android only) 

My Patreon https://www.patreon.com/CrazyEnigmaStudio

This is my first game so feel free to leave a comment on what I can improve thanks.
